known WINSTON trademark owned worldwide by R. J. Reynolds Tobacco Company, We must
insist that this Infringing activity cease Immediately,

We are particularly concerned about the use of our WINSTON trademark on balloons since
these {tems could be purchased and used by children. 11 fs our Company's policy not to sell or
advertise the sale of cigarettes to children. It fs alto our Company's policy not to allow the
unauthorized use of our teademarks on any products but especially on items which could be
purchased of used by children,

Your prompt written assurance that this Infringing activity will cease will bring this matter
toa sailsfactory conclusion, Ifwe do not hear from your company within a seatonable time, we
